mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(node_name,'(',node_code,')') AS nodeName, AVG(execute_time) AS executeTime FROM low_code_bot_node_execute_log group by nodeName order by executeTime
SELECT CONCAT(node_name,'(',node_code,')') AS nodeName, count(*) AS count FROM low_code_bot_node_execute_log group by nodeName order by count desc;
SELECT CONCAT(node_name,'(',node_code,')') AS nodeName, MAX(execute_time) AS count FROM low_code_bot_node_execute_log group by nodeName order by count;
